patthana2.8:232.1_0: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa
patthana2.8:232.1_1: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.8:233.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava …pe… noavigate nava.
patthana2.8:234.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi …pe… namagge tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.8:235.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.8:237.1_0: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo dhammo
patthana2.8:237.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā—nīvaraṇavippayuttaṁ nīvaraṇiyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
patthana2.8:237.1_2: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
